duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the General Manager with administrative tasks such as filing, data entry, and scheduling meetings.
Support the HR Manager with new hire paperwork, training sessions, and associate activities.
Gather data and prepare reports as needed by the General Manager.
Maintain strict confidentiality and handle customer and associate inquiries.
Process invoices, maintain expense tracking, and order store supplies.
Assist in providing a pleasant and productive shopping experience for customers.

education_certification.credential: High School education or equivalent experience
